A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Almost as good as the prequels. It was as if they were listening and reading all the fan theories and did the opposite. A fan of star wars will be disappointed and a super star wars nerd will be physically upset with this movie. I am not going to spoil this movie for you\, but if you were on the fence about going don't. Read a synopsis about and wait till you can stream it later. Save your money\, Disney has enough.
